summary.span: 命名空間是 .NET Framework Data Provider for Oracle。

span.span: The namespace is the .NET Framework Data Provider for Oracle.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此類型在已被取代，並且將在未來的.NET Framework 版本中移除。This types in are deprecated and will be removed in a future version of the .NET Framework. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [Oracle 和 ADO.NET](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/oracle-and-adonet.md)。For more information, see [Oracle and ADO.NET](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/oracle-and-adonet.md). .NET Framework Data Provider for Oracle 描述類別來存取 managed 空間中的 Oracle 資料來源的集合。The .NET Framework Data Provider for Oracle describes a collection of classes for accessing an Oracle data source in the managed space. 使用類別，您可以填入常駐記憶體、 查詢它，並用它來更新資料來源。Using the class, you can fill a memory-resident , query it, and use it to update the data source. 如需有關如何使用此命名空間的詳細資訊，請參閱 < ， ，和類別。For additional information about how to use this namespace, see the , , and classes. > [!NOTE] > 如需使用.NET Framework 進行程式設計時，請使用此命名空間的概念資訊，請參閱[Oracle 和 ADO.NET](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/oracle-and-adonet.md)。For conceptual information about using this namespace when programming with the .NET Framework, see [Oracle and ADO.NET](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/oracle-and-adonet.md). .NET Framework Data Provider for Oracle 支援 Oracle 資料類型，包括多種`BFILE`， `LOB`，和`REF CURSOR`資料型別。The .NET Framework Data Provider for Oracle supports a number of Oracle data types, including the `BFILE`, `LOB`, and `REF CURSOR` data types. 如需在參數中使用 Oracle 資料型別資訊，請參閱。For information about using Oracle data types in parameters, see .
